telecom.server.source

Class AbstractServerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • telecom.server.source.AbstractServerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, TrafficSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bursty, ConstantBitRate

    public abstract class AbstractServerThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrafficSource
    Abstract server thread type defines basic scaffold of traffic source.
